Class FactionManager

Stores, registers, and handles all the entities in the scene.

CheckCache(Faction, Transform, out FactionEntity, Boolean)

Checks the stored transforms to see if there is an entity associated

Declaration
public static bool CheckCache(Faction check, Transform object, out FactionEntity entity, bool add = false)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Faction check

The faction(s) to check. Can combine factions to check multiple, E.g. (Player | Monster)
UnityEngine.Transform object

The transform to check.
FactionEntity entity

The entity to (if it exists)
System.Boolean add

If an entity was not found, choose to add it to the faction (if GetComponent yields a FactionEntity)
Returns
Type Description
System.Boolean

If the transform was found in a checked faction

ProduceNoise(Faction, NoiseType, Vector3)

Produces a noise and broadcasts it to all etities listening for noise

Declaration
public static void ProduceNoise(Faction faction, NoiseType noise, Vector3 position)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Faction faction

The faction that produced the noise
NoiseType noise

The type of noise that was produced
UnityEngine.Vector3 position

The position of the noise
